mapper.sql: id, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_url, file_data, file_remark, file_record_time, file_operator
mapper.insert:
insert into `file` (file_name, file_type, file_size, file_url, file_data, file_remark, file_record_time, file_operator) values
(#{item.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileData,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{item.fileRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileRecordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.fileOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
